statements: DELETE FROM ProductInformation WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM product_pricing WHERE currency = 'USD' AND updated_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 100 AND spec_name = 'Color';
DELETE FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE spec_name = 'color' AND spec_value = 'blue';
DELETE FROM ProductPricing WHERE currency = 'USD' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProductReviews WHERE product_id = 123 AND rating <= 3;
DELETE FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE spec_name = 'Weight' AND spec_value >= '50 lbs';
